thread.title: Drake's New Video for "Hotline Bling" Has Everyone Talking About His Dancing
thread.title_full: Drake's New Video for "Hotline Bling" Has Everyone Talking About His Dancing

author: Cosmopolitan.com
title: Drake's New Video for "Hotline Bling" Has Everyone Talking About His Dancing
text:
Drake just released the video for "Hotline Bling" and people CANNOT stop talking about it. Specifically, the Internet has become totally fixated with Drake's dance moves. Rolling Store reports the booty-call loving hit tune's new video debuted on Apple Music on Monday night. Created by Director X, the video has already sparked a frenzy on Twitter, where people have become rather mesmerized by Drake's very unique dance moves.
 When you're the only one on the dance floor #HotlineBling #drake pic.twitter.com/2sHKdHtbr8
